Name: [Research] Overload Distribution
Desc: Each Pressure Overload restores <color=#2BAD00>5%</color> of Max HP and increases all squad members' DMG by <color=#2BAD00>5%</color>. (Current Bonus: {CReplaceCardParam:StressOverloadCount,0.01,2}%. Maximum: 50%.)
Desc2:
An exquisitely designed badge.
A special Resonium issued by the White Star Institute to Investigators of Hollow Zero, for research on overload-related matters.
